Text: Re heyIm meeting Mom at the lake this evening Well be home sometime Sunday I guess I cant play golf with you anymore Original Message From Smith Matt To Sent Friday May PM Subject hey Just wanted to let you know that im having some flowers delivered to the house tomorrow Sat for Mothers day They couldnt give me a time though I told them to leave them on the porch if noone is home Also I just got invited to play golf at TPC which if you dont know is the venue for the Houston Shell Open A round costs at least but free for me I better get to the range tomorrow Unfortunately every muscle in my body aches from working out and today we did arms so im really in trouble Oh well Talk to you soon Mat
